Lenovo Chromebook S330 Ordinateur portable 14" HD (1366 x 768) Processeur MediaTek MT8173C 4 Go LPDDR3 eMMC SSD Chrome OS 81JW0001US Noir
description: Conçu pour ceux qui rêvent plus grand, le Lenovo Chromebook S330 est parfait pour toutes vos tâches informatiques quotidiennes. La configuration est simple et rapide – il suffit de vous connecter à votre compte Google et vous êtes prêt à partir. Ce carnet pratique et portable vous apporte les dernières fonctionnalités de Chromebook, logé dans un châssis élégant et durable pour ordinateur portable fin noir. Vous pouvez travailler sans problème avec vos collègues via Google Drive et avoir accès à tous les meilleurs produits Google à offrir, standard sur votre Chromebook, avec les dernières applications sur Google Play Store. De YouTube aux cartes, en passant par les tenues, vous serez en mesure de personnaliser votre Chromebook S330 pour répondre à vos besoins quotidiens, que ce soit pour travailler, créer, divertir, ou tout simplement pour s'amuser. Doté du dernier multimédia en haute définition, ce Chromebook dispose d'un écran haute définition qui est presque sans bord, vous donnant des images nettes en Hi-Def sur un écran de 14 pouces. Ce carnet mesure moins de 2,5 cm d'épaisseur et ne pèse que 3. 1,4 kg. Il est donc parfait à emporter avec vous lors de vos déplacements. Vous apprécierez également le clavier complet, la grande boule de contrôle et jusqu'à 10 heures d'autonomie. Restez synchronisé avec votre téléphone, tablette et partout où vous vous connectez avec Google, où que vous soyez. Ne ralentit jamais et est toujours à la pointe du temps, le Lenovo Chromebook S330 offre la dernière sécurité numérique tout en offrant une performance parfaite au quotidien. Il offre une protection contre les virus intégrée et des mises à jour automatiques, gardant votre logiciel sécurisé et efficace sans aucun temps supplémentaire ou attention nécessaire. Avec son traitement puissant, son EM et sa mémoire DDR3, vous aurez la performance dont vous avez besoin dans un ensemble simple et portable.

titre: Samsung Galaxy Book NP750XDA-KD8IT 15.6" 1920 x 1080 Pixels Intel Core i5-11xxx 8 GB 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Pro
description: Thin enough to pack, light enough to carry. This Galaxy Book easily goes wherever you go. This portable and thin profile unfolds to reveal a wide workspace, complete with a narrow bezel to maximize the screen-to-body ratio. And the lightweight, full aluminum body offers durability. Easy on the eyes with anti-glare technology. With the 15.6' FHD display and Dolby Atmos® sound, Galaxy Book delivers an immersive visual and audio experience. Slim bezels and a wide 170° viewing angle pull you in, while the bright 300-nit display includes anti-glare technology to keep your eyes comfortable. Stay connected, even on the go. Go online with powerful data speeds thanks to the option of 4G Connectivity. Insert a SIM card to access your data plan and experience low latency and high security, giving you the freedom to get things done from anywhere at any time. Galaxy Ecosystem. Integrate life and tech seamlessly with the interconnected Galaxy Ecosystem. Sharing made easy. Quick Share. Connect wirelessly and share photos, videos or files with others by simply clicking the share button. You can also send documents to a group of people all at once. Quick pairing, no hassle. Easy Bluetooth Connection. Pairing between Galaxy Book and Galaxy Buds is easier than ever. Simply open the case near your laptop and you’re ready to go. No hassle. Your world just got smarter. SmartThings. Control your smart home from your Galaxy Book Pro with SmartThings. You can also track the location of all your Galaxy devices with SmartThings Find. Seeing double. Second screen. Get more done with a multi-screen experience with the integrated Second screen feature using your Galaxy Tab S7, S7+ and S Pen. Mobile apps on your Galaxy Book. Your Phone. Connect your Galaxy Book with the apps on your Galaxy mobile phone using Microsoft Your Phone app, and seamlessly run up to 5 of your favourite apps from your Galaxy Book. All your Samsung Notes across devices. Samsung Notes & Auto Sync. From PDF importing & annotation to auto-syncing in real time, the handy features of Samsung Notes are completely redesigned to take productivity to new heights. Insert voice memos, turn handwriting to text and be ready for whenever inspiration strikes. Sync, transfer, done. Galaxy Book Smart Switch. Simply link the devices using a wireless connection to seamlessly transfer photos, videos, music and documents from an old laptop. Smart Switch even keeps your settings and moves your UWP (Universal Windows Platform) apps for hassle free file transfer. Intel® provides the performance to stay on track. Equipped with the latest Intel® CoreTM CPU and GPU, Galaxy Book delivers incredible computing power that's up to the task. It can take on your busy days seamlessly, even when you’re multi-tasking, streaming or gaming. Long-lasting battery, compact universal charger. The Galaxy Book presents the ultimate power couple with its long-lasting battery and a super-compact, fast charger which can universally charge any of your Galaxy devices. The mighty battery is capable of running up to 10.9 hours on a single charge. Professional video calls, less noise. Put on an impressive video presentation with camera Studio mode. Get crystal clear calls with auto-background noise reduction, so you're heard loud and clear every time. While the Studio mode helps you look as good as you sound. Plus, built-in privacy shortcuts for added peace of mind. More ports for more portability. Level up your mobility and leave the dongles behind. The Galaxy Book features 7 versatile ports, so you can simply plug in your peripherals and get to work. Expand your disk space with Dual SSD. Two SSD slots make upgrading your storage easy if you need more—one slot comes with up to 512GB built in, and you can install 1TB of additional storage in the second slot. Now you can save, file, store and archive huge volumes of data without the hassle. Record, edit and share. The Screen Recorder feature makes creating videos a breeze—simply capture what's on your screen and add voice commentaries. Editing is easy and intuitive with Studio Plus. It comes packaged with background music, powerful editing effects and connects directly to your gallery for easy importing.

titre: Lenovo V V15 15.6" 1920 x 1080 Pixels AMD Ryzen 3 8 GB 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home
description: Achieve more, stress less. From videoconferences to presentations and multitasking, the slim, sleek Lenovo V15 (AMD) takes everything in its stride. With powerful AMD processing, this affordable 15.6\" laptop helps you get more done while safeguarding your sensitive data. As well as an enhanced viewing experience, it comes with the built-in reliability and productivity features to save you time and effort. Get more done, safely & securely. With powerful AMD processing, the Lenovo V15 (AMD) laptop has the muscle to tackle any task. You can choose the storage options (HDD or PCIe SSD) that suit your needs—and budget. And with the integrated firmware, Trusted Platform Module (TPM) 2.0, your passwords and data are encrypted for enhanced security. Redefines contemporary. Stylish and sleek, the Lenovo V15 (AMD) laptop adds a premium look and feel to everything you do. To raise the bar even higher, you can choose to have an in-mold rolling cover with textured lines and an FHD (1920 x 1080) 15.6\" display, with narrow side bezels for a better, clearer visual experience. Totally dependable, wholly reliable. Rest assured, the Lenovo V15 (AMD) laptop has your back. Fully tested for reliability and durability, it has undergone various extreme tests, including for shocks, vibrations, and operating temperatures. So you know it will handle whatever your business day brings. Modern style and impressive function. Stylish and sleek, the Lenovo V15 (AMD) laptop adds a premium look and feel to everything you do. description:
Le HUAWEI MateBook D 16 dispose d'un affichage FullView avec un taux d'occupation de l'écran de 90% et des bordures de 4,9 mm. Cet ordinateur portable de HUAWEI alimenté par les processeurs AMD Ryzen ™ 4000 H-Series et fonctionne sur Windows 10 Home. Le D16 dispose d'un clavier AZERTY et d'une caméra rétractable pour une protection de votre vie privée

Les pales de 0,2 mm du système de ventilation à double aileron HUAWEI Shark travaillent silencieusement. La touche de raccourci Fn + P peut faire passer le MateBook D 16 en mode Performance, augmentant la fonction de refroidissement et améliorant les performances du processeur. Il fournit un son surround multicanal jusqu'à 7.1, une correction de distorsion intégrée, une caméra encastrée et un clavier rétroéclairé. La capacité de la batterie de 56 Wh (capacité nominale) avec la technologie de charge rapide, les 16 Go de RAM et 512 Go de SSD NVMe PCIe, ainsi que les performances stables à long terme testées alimenteront efficacement votre utilisation quotidienne.

- Le terme « écran FullView » désigne un écran à bords étroits offrant un rapport écran/châssis élevé. Les données concernant la surface d’écran visible sont issues des laboratoires Huawei.
- Épaisseur sans les coussinets. L’épaisseur et le poids réels dépendent de la configuration du produit.
- Huawei Share prend en charge la collaboration multi-écrans entre un smartphone Huawei (uniquement certains modèles spécifiques) doté d’un système d’exploitation EMUI 11 ou version ultérieure et un ordinateur portable HUAWEI MateBook équipé de l’utilitaire PC Manager 11 ou version ultérieure. Seuls certains types de fichiers et certaines applications pour smartphone prennent en charge cette fonctionnalité. Pour en savoir plus avant d’acheter des produits connexes ou d’utiliser cette fonctionnalité, cliquez sur le lien suivant : En savoir plus sur Huawei Share.
- La capacité de 2 To est la capacité maximale prise en charge par deux logements de disque dur. Chaque disque dur prend en charge 1 To de capacité maximum. Prise en charge du stockage SSD M.2 2280 exclusivement.
- Pour le test de l’autonomie de batterie, la luminosité de l’écran est réglée sur 150 nits. L’autonomie de la batterie varie selon les habitudes et les conditions d’utilisation. Le chargeur de 65 W d’origine est utilisé pour charger l’ordinateur portable pendant 15 minutes en mode Veille à partir d’un niveau de batterie de 1 %. Les performances réelles varient selon le produit, les habitudes d’utilisation et l’environnement.
- La charge inversée est prise en charge par les téléphones compatibles USB-C tels que les modèles HUAWEI Mate40, HUAWEI P40 et HUAWEI P30. Vous devez utiliser le câble de charge d’origine. Le HUAWEI MateBook doit avoir plus de 10 % de charge restante et le téléphone doit être allumé.
- La sortie audio multicanal nécessite des sources audio surround 5.1 ou 7.1, que les produits HUAWEI MateBook utilisent pour virtualiser les effets acoustiques correspondants. Les performances réelles varient selon la qualité du son, l’environnement et les charges des appareils.

Mise à niveau gratuite vers Windows 11 dès sa disponibilité*.
*La mise à niveau vers Windows 11 sera disponible entre fin 2021 et 2022. Sa disponibilité variera en fonction des appareils. Certaines fonctionnalités requièrent un matériel spécifique.

titre: Samsung Galaxy Book NP750XDA-KD7IT 15.6" 1920 x 1080 Pixels Intel Core i5-11xxx 8 GB 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Pro
description: Thin enough to pack, light enough to carry. This Galaxy Book easily goes wherever you go. This portable and thin profile unfolds to reveal a wide workspace, complete with a narrow bezel to maximize the screen-to-body ratio. And the lightweight, full aluminum body offers durability. Easy on the eyes with anti-glare technology. With the 15.6' FHD display and Dolby Atmos® sound, Galaxy Book delivers an immersive visual and audio experience. Slim bezels and a wide 170° viewing angle pull you in, while the bright 300-nit display includes anti-glare technology to keep your eyes comfortable. Stay connected, even on the go. Go online with powerful data speeds thanks to the option of 4G Connectivity. Insert a SIM card to access your data plan and experience low latency and high security, giving you the freedom to get things done from anywhere at any time. Galaxy Ecosystem. Integrate life and tech seamlessly with the interconnected Galaxy Ecosystem. Sharing made easy. Quick Share. Connect wirelessly and share photos, videos or files with others by simply clicking the share button. You can also send documents to a group of people all at once. Quick pairing, no hassle. Easy Bluetooth Connection. Pairing between Galaxy Book and Galaxy Buds is easier than ever. Simply open the case near your laptop and you’re ready to go. No hassle. Your world just got smarter. SmartThings. Control your smart home from your Galaxy Book Pro with SmartThings. You can also track the location of all your Galaxy devices with SmartThings Find. Seeing double. Second screen. Get more done with a multi-screen experience with the integrated Second screen feature using your Galaxy Tab S7, S7+ and S Pen. Mobile apps on your Galaxy Book. Your Phone. Connect your Galaxy Book with the apps on your Galaxy mobile phone using Microsoft Your Phone app, and seamlessly run up to 5 of your favourite apps from your Galaxy Book. All your Samsung Notes across devices. Samsung Notes & Auto Sync. From PDF importing & annotation to auto-syncing in real time, the handy features of Samsung Notes are completely redesigned to take productivity to new heights. Insert voice memos, turn handwriting to text and be ready for whenever inspiration strikes. Sync, transfer, done. Galaxy Book Smart Switch. Simply link the devices using a wireless connection to seamlessly transfer photos, videos, music and documents from an old laptop. Smart Switch even keeps your settings and moves your UWP (Universal Windows Platform) apps for hassle free file transfer. Intel® provides the performance to stay on track. Equipped with the latest Intel® CoreTM CPU and GPU, Galaxy Book delivers incredible computing power that's up to the task. It can take on your busy days seamlessly, even when you’re multi-tasking, streaming or gaming. Long-lasting battery, compact universal charger. The Galaxy Book presents the ultimate power couple with its long-lasting battery and a super-compact, fast charger which can universally charge any of your Galaxy devices. The mighty battery is capable of running up to 10.9 hours on a single charge. Professional video calls, less noise. Put on an impressive video presentation with camera Studio mode. Get crystal clear calls with auto-background noise reduction, so you're heard loud and clear every time. While the Studio mode helps you look as good as you sound. Plus, built-in privacy shortcuts for added peace of mind. More ports for more portability. Level up your mobility and leave the dongles behind. The Galaxy Book features 7 versatile ports, so you can simply plug in your peripherals and get to work. Expand your disk space with Dual SSD. Two SSD slots make upgrading your storage easy if you need more—one slot comes with up to 512GB built in, and you can install 1TB of additional storage in the second slot. Now you can save, file, store and archive huge volumes of data without the hassle. Record, edit and share. The Screen Recorder feature makes creating videos a breeze—simply capture what's on your screen and add voice commentaries. Editing is easy and intuitive with Studio Plus. It comes packaged with background music, powerful editing effects and connects directly to your gallery for easy importing.

titre: Lenovo V V17 17.3" 1920 x 1080 Pixels Intel Core i7-10xxx 12 GB 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Pro
description: Small-busines performer, big-screen display. Keep your business productive and your data secure with the Lenovo V17 laptop. Engineered for small business, the V17 runs on a 10th Gen Intel® Core™ processor. Its massive 17” display gives you plenty of room to multitask—and its numeric keypad lets you tear through spreadsheets quickly. Work faster—and better. Dual-storage, discrete NVIDIA® graphics, and other options beef up productivity on the Lenovo V17 laptop. Its Intel® Core™ processor fuels speed and responsiveness and makes multitasking easy. Big visuals. The Lenovo V17’s optional 17\" FHD (1920 x 1080) display yields vivid colours and clarity, with narrow side bezels to enhance the view. This laptop’s contemporary design gives it a premium look and feel, with a slim body that travels well when you’re not in the office. Tough & reliable. We tested this laptop for reliability and durability against eight extreme conditions: shock test, vibration test, keyboard in-system test, hinge life test, fan reliability test, panel scuff test, operating temperature test, and pressure test. It’s ready for whatever conditions your business can put it through. Safe & secure. Data security is essential for any small business, and the Lenovo V17 laptop is designed to keep yours safe. Integrated firmware—Trusted Platform Module (TPM) 2.0—keeps your work secure by encrypting data and passwords. A webcam shutter lets you physically block the camera until you want to be onscreen. And an optional fingerprint reader integrated into the power button lets you log in securely and conveniently.

description: Notre histoire a commencé il y a plus de trois décennies avec une équipe de onze ingénieurs en Chine. Et au-delà.

description: Connect To The World At Home With FHD Webcam. No matter what you are learning, working or cooking at home, you can connect to the world with MSI FHD webcam which brings the best video quality. The camera is removable if you need more privacy. Anti-Flicker With Eye-Care Technology. Thanks to MSI’s Anti-Flicker technology, it eliminates flickering and effectively reduces eye fatigue caused by prolonged screen time while enhancing the productivity at home or in the office. See More, Do More At Home. Thanks to MSI’s Instant Display Technology, Modern AM271 series can also be used as a monitor without booting up its system. When devices are connected to the HDMI-in port, the screen will be turn on immediately. The Best Position While Working & Learning At Home. You are able to learn or manage your E-commerce with a comfortable viewing position and can always adjust the tilt & height according to different situations. Mount With MSI VESA Arm. Enjoy a clean cable management with the MSI MT81 which supports the VESA standards, you can share any information or e-learning material with family at home or in the office. Reversible Type-C With USB 3.2 Gen 2. When backup your projects at home you can get all the performance benefits from USB 3.2 Gen2, combined with the convenience of the USB Type-C connector. The reversible USB Type C also allows for effortless connecting of USB devices. 5-Way Navigator OSD Control. The World’s First All-in-One PC with 5-Way Navigator for an easy OSD Control. Easy Maintenance Design. With the Storage Rapid Upgrade Design, maintaining or upgrading your 2.5” storage on Modern AM271 series will not be a nightmare any more. Opportunity To The World for Your E-Commerce At Home. It is indispensable to have a stable data & information platform for your growing E-commerce/ M-commerce at home. Work From Home with IPS Grade Panel. Modern AM271 Series is equipped with IPS Grade Panel which not only instantly optimizes the screen colors and brightness , but also ensures that you have the best E-commerce management experience while working from home or learning its professional tasks at home. Secure Your E-Commerce Data At Home & In The Office. FW TPM (Trusted Platform Module) technology is designed to provide hardware-based, security-related functions. You can store your sensitive data & passwords by encryption keys for advanced security. Cool & Silence Your World Even You Didn’t Notice It. Modern AM271 Series is equipped with Silent Pro Cooling System. Part of this system is a Server Grade Thermal Module that handles the cooling of different components within the system. Besides that we put the most important key components on the top side so warm air can easily move out and we separate the air flow to make sure the system's temperature stays perfectly under control for a cool and silent operation. Just enjoy the Silent, Stable & Professional Experience. Successful & Stylish B2B projects. Over the past years, MSI has successfully supported Countless of commercial projects, including government tenders, restaurant & hotel facilitation, shopping mall navigation projects, school & university developments and professional office projects.
